intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Quite the bustling little town.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: The harvest must've just come in. I wager there's some good eating to be had!

intro.speaker: Lissa
intro.line: Count me in! It's been DAYS since I had a proper meal!

intro.speaker: Villager
intro.line: Welcome to the Grub Sh-ACK! Y-you're... You're...

intro.speaker: Villager
intro.line: T-terribly sorry, sir, but we're closed!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: That was...odd. I guess we'll try elsewhere.

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: This place looks open, Father. ...Ooh, they have pottage!

intro.speaker: Maiden
intro.line: Eeek!

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: Hmm?

intro.speaker: Maiden
intro.line: P-please, not again! We'll be ruined! This tavern is all we have! Mercy, sirs! Leave us in peace!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: People here don't seem to like us very much.

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: I did a little investigating on that front, milord. It seems a band of nasty rogues have been harrying them without pause for some time. Apparently, they are led by a man who masquerades as...you.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: *Sigh* So that's what this is about. Any idea where they are?

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: It seems they headed north, milord.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Then so shall we.

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Heh heh... Another fine haul. Long live the great Chrom!

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: Chrom? Father? Faaather? Pegasus Knight Cynthia, returned from patrol, sir! ...Whoops!  Ooh... Right on the face... S-sorry for my clumsiness, sir! I promise not to trip again for at least 24 hours!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: That'd be a new record... Now out with it, girl! What'd you see?

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: A suspicious band of travelers have been making inquiries in town, sir.

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Oh?

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: They call their leader Chrom, sir. I suspect they are impostors posing as you! They must be stopped at once, Father!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Cynthia, what did I say about calling me that around the men?

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: S-sorry, Father! I mean, Chrom! Milord! ...It won't happen again.

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Your mind's near as slippery as your feet... Anyway, we, uh, don't have the men to battle this impostor right now. Best swallow our pride and exercise the better part of valor for now.

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: Levelheaded and humble as ever, sir! Allow me to draw their attention while you retreat to safety!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Yes, yes, of course. A fine plan.

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: I won't let you down, sir!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: ...... ...Gads, she's dumb as a brick. Good thing her spear is sharper than her wit. Still, at least she stopped ranting about hailing from the future...

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Heh heh... Another fine haul. Long live the great Chrom!

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: Chrom? Sir? Pegasus Knight Cynthia, returned from patrol, sir! ...Whoops!  Oof... Right on the face... S-sorry for my clumsiness, sir! I promise not to trip again for at least 24 hours!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: That'd be a new record... Now out with it, girl! What did you see?

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: A suspicious band of travelers have been making inquiries in town, sir.

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Oh?

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: They call their leader Chrom, sir. I suspect they are impostors posing as you! They must be stopped at once!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Er, riiight. Posing as...me. But, uh, we don't have the men to battle these impostors right now. Best swallow our pride and exercise the better part of valor for now.

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: Levelheaded and humble as ever, sir! Allow me to draw their attention while you retreat to safety!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: Yes, yes, of course. A fine plan.

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: I won't let you down, sir!

intro.speaker: Ruger
intro.line: ...... Gads, she's dumb as a brick. ...Still, full marks for enthusiasm.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: And you are...?

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: All who would pretend to Chrom's name will answer to me for their deceit! Lay down your arms and surrender, or face judgement at my spear!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Well, she certainly seems eager. What do you think, Robin? If she's being honestly deceived, we may be able to show her the truth.

intro.speaker: Cynthia
intro.line: Enough! In the name of my lord Chrom, cast down your sword or draw it!

battle.speaker: Ruger
battle.line: Hmm? A band of mercenaries? Luck smiles on me today! A few pretty lies, and I'll have the lot of 'em fighting for me!

battle.speaker: Ruger
battle.line: Haaalp! I am Chrom, ruler of Ylisse! I'm being hunted by brigands! If you help me, I'll see to it that you're handsomely rewarded!

battle.speaker: Ruger
battle.line: Hold fast until I give the word. The moment they clear that rubble, fall on them like an avalanche!

battle.speaker: Ruger
battle.line: Still not coming, are you? Then the initiative will be ours!

recruit-talk.speaker: Sumia
recruit-talk.line: Pardon me, but...I think you may be misinformed. Can we speak a moment?

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Don't waste your breath! Your lies ring hollow! Your...ring? ...Ring? Y-your RING! MOTHER!

recruit-talk.speaker: Sumia
recruit-talk.line: ...What?

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: It is you! Oh, Mother, you're alive! I never thought I'd see you again! I...I... *sniff* Waaaaaaaaaah!

recruit-talk.speaker: Sumia
recruit-talk.line: Um...are you all right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: WAIT! But if you're on that side, that means... Ohmigosh. My Chrom is a FAKE! Oh, I am going to KILL him for this! I'm going to plant a flying hoof right in his stupid liar face!

recruit-talk.speaker: Sumia
recruit-talk.line: Wait! We really should... Well, at least she's not confused anymore. If only I could say the same for me...

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Still your spear a moment and hear me out. You've been lied to!

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Spare me your tales, brigand! I have nothing to say to someone who would impersonate my mother's dearest friend!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Your...mother?

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: You heard me! How dare you besmirch my mother Sumia's name!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: And it all becomes clear... Well, welcome to the past.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Wha—?! But how could you know?

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: That you came from the future? Lucina told me all about it.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Lucy's here?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: In the flesh.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Then...you're the real Chrom?

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Last I checked.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Ugh, I'm so sorry! I've always been gullible, ever since I was a little girl, but... Hey! This means the other Chrom LIED! Oh, I'm going to kill him for this! I'm going to plant a flying hoof right in his stupid liar face!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Still your spear a moment and hear me out. You've been lied to!

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Spare me your tales, brigand! I've nothing to say to someone who would impersonate my father!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Your what? Oh, for the love of... How many daughters are going to come back in time to see me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Huh? H-how did you know I-

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: I already went through this with Lucina.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Lucy's here?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: In the flesh. ...Though she neglected to mention she had a sister.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Wait—then you really are...! Oh, Father! I missed you SOOOOO MUUUCH!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: My... my ears...

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: I knew something was fishy with that guy! He barely even smiled when I found him. My REAL father would've given me a big hug and called me his little pega-pony princess!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: ...Please tell me I never actually say that.

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: You'll say it right now, if you want me to believe you're the real Chrom!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: Uh... It's... it's good to see you, my... Um... My little pega-pony princess...

recruit-talk.speaker: Cynthia
recruit-talk.line: Aww, it's good to see you too, Father! I can't believe I fell for that lying creep's lies! Oh, I am going to KILL him for this! I'm going to plant a flying hoof right in his stupid liar face!

recruit-talk.speaker: Chrom
recruit-talk.line: She's even flightier than her mother. ...I didn't think that was possible.

boss.speaker: Ruger
boss.line: I'm not dying in a backwater like this! I'll take what's handy and then take off!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: That’s the last of them.

end.speaker: Frederick
end.line: We can explain the truth to those mercenaries as we tend their wounds. Frankly, I’m shocked that scoundrel had the audacity to impersonate you, milord.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Not the worst of his crimes, I’m sure.

end.speaker: Frederick
end.line: It is unacceptable, milord. I have clearly failed in my duties as a knight. I shall draft a series of portraits and see that copies are distributed to all! Never again shall someone mistake the noble visage of my lord Chrom for—

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Frederick. Let’s just go.

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: Do you have a moment, Sumia?

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: Oh, hello. You’re the girl from...before. Er...

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: Cynthia! My name is Cynthia!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: What a darling name.

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: Tee hee! I KNOW! I’ve always loved it. It was a gift from my mother. ...From you.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: What? Me? But I... I’ve never seen...

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: Oh, but you WILL! Isn’t that great?! I came from the FUTURE, Mother! See? Our rings match up and everything! It’s ‘cause you gave it to me! Or you will. I mean, later. Before I come back here, but after I... Gods, this is confusing!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: You...you’re my daughter...?

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: I sure am! I missed you so, Mother. Come here. Give me a hug— Whoops!  Ooh. That one’s gonna bruise... Er, don’t worry about me. I’m fine!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: ...Well, we’re definitely related. Hold on. You dropped something. ...A spearhead?

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: S-sorry! I’ll take that back!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: Why are you carrying that around?

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: Because it hasn’t been made yet. You promised me we’d make it together.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: I did?

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: But you broke your promise the day... The day you never came home. How could you leave me, Mother? You were a legend! You were invincible!

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: Wait, are you saying I...died? I’m so sorry, love. I guess I’m not much of a legend after all.

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: ...You are to me.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: ...I may not be invincible, but at least I was blessed with a wonderful child. Had we decided what sort of haft to give the spear? We can pick up the materials in the next town.

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: W-we can?

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: I made a promise, didn’t I?

end.speaker: Cynthia
end.line: *sniff* Oh...oh, Mother... I love you!
